envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with coarse, unbecoming language that was inappropriate for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgarity through words, violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when fine dining and wine tasting experiences are involved?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of temperance?

prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed my desire for leisure activities or personal indulgences to take precedence over my financial obligations, leading to excessive and wasteful spending?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me for personal gain, neglecting my responsibilities and priorities?

gossip.question: Have I shared others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, for the purpose of entertainment or to gain recognition among my social connections?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
